actions.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Hunter to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Hunter to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment facilitates the supply of domestic aggregate for nationally significant freight and highway projects.
purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to facilitate the supply of domestic aggregate for nationally significant freight and highway projects.
